to show information in the form of a table (= an arrangement of facts and numbers in rows or blocks)

Add to word list
Add to word list
to arrange facts, numbers, or other information in the form of a table: We plan to tabulate the findings of our survey.
Add to word list
Add to word list
to arrange information in the form of a table (= in rows or columns): The results of the survey have not yet been tabulated. The reports tabulated statistics on income, poverty and health insurance. tabulation noun [ U ]
the tabulation of data
